text.text_translated:
Sometimes, a bridge falls down. People do not know why. Engineers must study it. They find the reason only after this study.
One reason is bad materials. Workers used bad materials to build it. Or an important part of the bridge had a problem.
Another reason is weight. They made the bridge for a certain weight. It cannot hold more weight.

best_attempt.text_translated: Some bridges fall down. The reason is often a mystery. Engineers must study them well. Then they find out why. Sometimes, bad materials were used to build the bridge. Or an important part was broken. Other times, the bridge was made for a certain weight. It could not carry more.
